detaileddescription.para: This document contains the Software Detailed Design documentation for the LIN Integration component which is part of the LIN_Com functionality. The SWDD is done in accordance with the defined quality standards processes for ICAS1 project, and the Continental SW detailed design method. This will serve as the basis for implementation.

Describes the detailed design of the LIN Integration as defined in the SWA along with all software units for this component.
This includes the following design elements:
Decomposition of SW component into files including allocation of C-functions to files.
Internal interaction of the SW units and variant dependencies.
Dynamic behavior among SW units on the software component level.
Description of C-functions in natural language along with UML activity diagrams and design decisions.
Text-based description of content and usage for the global and member data (variables, structs, enums, unions, defines, etc.).
